short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to Arcade Classics - a free browser extension with 9 games to play!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 3.0 coming soon!
Featuring a new game engine, revamped leader-boards, and two new games! Download the extension to receive status updates for an early 2025 release!

As seen on hit Youtube™️ channel, Linus Tech Tips, Arcade Classics is a fun extension with 9 games to play! Ranging from the fast-paced skill game of Tetris to the relaxed logic of 2048. Arcade Classics provides loads of entertainment in a browser extension! Compete against friends and record breakers on our leader-boards, and show off your commitment through personal stats and achievements! There are 40+ achievements to collect, and many more on the way!

Games Include:
- Tetris
- Pong
- Breakout
- Space Invaders
- Pacman
- And More!!

We have so many games, even Google didn't believe it! That's right, Google didn't let us list how many games we have!

View our website for our change-log and info: https://arcade-classics.github.io
